meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Barrett Evans Tish Koch Drew Horwood Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6562.

td.p: Barrett Evans, a web publisher from Portland, Oregon
Tish Koch, an education finance consultant from Long Beach, California
Drew Horwood, a business analyst from Minneapolis, Minnesota (whose 5-day cash winnings total $79,197)

tr.td: THE QUOTABLE MARK TWAIN
ON THE GEOGRAPHIC MENU
TAKE ME OUT TO THE BASEBALL MOVIE
LET US GO FOURTH
HOW ODD
"Y U" LITTLE...
